title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister housing local government heritage) order 2025

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: John McDonald, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

John McDonald, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, with effect from 24 January 2025.
text_norm: 2 john mcdonald particular whose address deposited office department housing local government heritage appointed special adviser minister housing local government heritage effect 24 january 2025

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Síona Cahill, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Síona Cahill, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, with effect from 7 April 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 

8 July, 2025. 

MÍCHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [322] 3
